definition: to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House
to compete/to take part in a competition
to exhibit at or take part in a trade show etc
to formally call on/to worship (a God)/to pay homage to sb
to consult a reference/to refer to (another document)

sentences.english: Heat oil. Add Chng Kee's Sambal Belacan Chilli Paste and stir-fry until fragrant.
sentences.chinese: 用熱油翻炒莊記參芭芭拉煎辣椒醬至香味溢出。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a method for determination of the content of total coumarin in Chuanminshen viloaceum.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立川明參藥材中總香豆素含量測定方法。

sentences.english: Parameters are pushed onto the stack from right to left.
sentences.chinese: 型參按照從右至左的順序被推入棧中。

sentences.english: They bamboozled him into joining the army.
Aim To establish a bacterial endotoxin inspection method of shenfu injection.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立參附註射液的細菌內毒素檢查法。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the action of Shenfu injection on abdominal dialysis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討參附註射液在腹膜透析中作用。

sentences.english: When he was grown, he joined the army, and there was even less time for reading.
sentences.chinese: 長大後，他參了軍，看書的時間更少了。

sentences.english: To observe the effect of Shenfu injection on patients rehabilitation after digestive surgery.
sentences.chinese: 觀察參附註射液對消化外科手術後患者康復的影響。

sentences.english: Conclusions Ginseng-monkshood extract injection has obviously protective effect on myocardial ischemia reperfusion injury.
sentences.chinese: 結論參附註射液對缺血再灌注損傷心臟具有保護作用。

sentences.english: The official was impeached for taking a bribe .
Wang Jinhai(Chareman of the Board of Directors), met the deputies of Nigerian senators and members of House of Representatives.
sentences.chinese: 王金海先生會見尼日利亞參衆議員代表。

sentences.english: All visitors to the site must wear safety helmet.
sentences.chinese: 到工地的所有參不雅觀者必需帶上安全帽。

sentences.english: A man of Mi who had the same first and last names as Zeng Shen killed a man.
sentences.chinese: 當地有一個與曾參同名同姓的人殺了一個人。

sentences.english: What's the benefit of doing the extracurricular activities?
sentences.chinese: 參於課外活動有什麼好處？

sentences.english: We can swim and visit a lot of beautiful places.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以游泳和參跪求陳光標觀很多美好的地方。

sentences.english: The official was impeached for taking a bribe.

definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
abbr. for 眾議院|众议院[Zhong4 yi4 yuan4], House of Representatives
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
to lean against/to rely on/on the basis of/no matter (how, what etc)/proof
